tuv.seg: Case study 2: How income from employment affects your Jobseeker's Allowance
Cás-staidéar 2: Conas a bhíonn tionchar ag ioncam ó fhostaíocht in Éirinn ar an Liúntas do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta
This case study shows the affect of work on Jobseeker's Allowance in 2017
Léiríonn an cás-staidéar seo an tionchar a bhíonn ag obair ar an Liúntas do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta in 2017
Frank is living with his partner Joanne and their two children
Tá Frank ina chónaí lena pháirtí Joanne agus lena mbeirt leanaí
He recently lost his job and has applied for Jobseeker's Allowance
Chaill sé a phost le gairid agus tá iarratas déanta aige ar Liúntas do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta
He has some temporary work driving a minibus for a local disability service every Saturday and Sunday
Tá obair shealadach aige ag tiomáint mionbhus do sheirbhís áitiúil do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas gach Satharn agus Domhnach
His assessable average weekly earnings are €140
Tá a thuilleamh seachtainiúil inmheasúnaithe cothrom le €140
Joanne is working part-time for 3 days a week and earns €85 per week
Tá Joanne ag obair go páirtaimseartha trí lá sa tseachtain agus tuileann sí €85 in aghaidh na seachtaine
She is also getting Child Benefit for the two children
Faigheann sí Sochar Leanaí don bheirt leanaí chomh maith
They recently sold their old family home and bought a newer house
Dhíol siad seanteach an teaghlaigh le déanaí agus cheannaigh siad teach níos nuaí
They made a profit of €15,000 on the sale of their house and have an additional €5,000 savings
Rinne siad brabús €15,000 ar dhíol an tí agus tá coigilteas breise €5,000 acu
First calculate Frank and Joanne's means
Ar dtús ríomh acmhainní Frank agus Joanne

Iomlán Ráta an Liúntais do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta atá iníoctha le Frank €305.70
Firstly, assess Frank's income from work using the following formula:
Ar dtús, déan ioncam Frank ón obair a mheasúnú agus úsáid á baint as an bhfoirmle seo a leanas:
€20 per day from casual work (up to a maximum of €60) will be deducted from his average assessable weekly earnings and then 60% of the balance will be assessed as his weekly means

Déanfar €20 in aghaidh an lae ó obair ócáideach (suas le huasmhéid de €60) a bhaint as a mheántuilleamh inmheasúnaithe seachtainiúil, agus ansin déanfar 60% den fhuílleach a mheasúnú mar a acmhainní seachtainiúla
€140 - €40 (don dá lá a oibríodh) = €100 x 60% = €60
The following allowances are always deducted from your gross earnings to get your assessable earnings:
Déantar na lamháltais a leanas a asbhaint ó d’olltuilleamh i gcónaí chun do thuilleamh inmheasúnaithe a fháil:
• PRSA (Personal Retirement Savings Account
• CCSP (Cuntas Coigiltis Scoir Pearsanta)
Frank's weekly means from employment of €60 is less than the maximum amount he would be entitled to for his circumstances (€380.70)
Tá acmhainní seachtainiúla Frank ó fhostaíocht arb ionann iad agus €60 níos lú ná an t-uasmhéid a bheadh sé i dteideal a fháil ó thaobh a imthosca (€380.70)
Because we now know he is entitled to a certain amount of Jobseeker's Allowance the next step is to calculate the actual amount of Jobseeker's Allowance he is entitled to

Toisc go bhfuil a fhios againn anois go bhfuil sé i dteideal méid áirithe dá Liúntas do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta a choinneáil is é an chéad chéim eile ná méid iarbhír an Liúntais do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta a bhfuil sé i dteideal a fháil a ríomh
To do this you must calculate his 'assessable daily earnings'
Caithfidh tú a ‘thuilleamh inmheasúnaithe laethúil’ a ríomh chun é seo a dhéanamh
He is entitled to JA only for periods of unemployment
Níl sé i dteideal an LLCF a fháil ach do thréimhsí dífhostaíochta amháin
The minimum period a person must be unemployed in order to receive JA is 4 days in a period of 7 consecutive days
Is é an íostréimhse go gcaithfidh duine a bheith dífhostaithe chun LLCF a fháil ná 4 lá i dtréimhse 7 lá as a chéile
Frank has 5 consecutive days of unemployment
Tá cúig lá dífhostaíochta as a chéile ag Frank
He is employed for 2 days out of 7
Tá sé fostaithe 2 lá as 7 lá
Frank's average assessable daily earnings are €140
Is ionann meántuilleamh inmheasúnaithe laethúil Frank agus (€140)
Less disregard for days worked €140 - €40 = €100 (No disregard for Sunday)
Lúideneamhaird don lá a oibríodh €140 - €40 = €100
60 % of his assessable daily earnings of €100= €60
60 % dá thuilleamh laethúil inmheasúnaithe de €100= €60
Frank's assessable income from employment is €60
Tá Ioncam inmheasúnaithe Frank ó fhostaíocht cothrom le €60
Joanne's income from employment is €85
Is é an t-ioncam ó fhostaíocht a fhaigheann Joanne ná €85
€20 per day from casual work (up to a maximum of €60) will be deducted from her average assessable weekly earnings and then 60% of the balance will be assessed as her weekly means

Déanfar €20 in aghaidh an lae ó obair ócáideach (suas le huasmhéid de €60) a asbhaint óna meántuilleamh inmheasúnaithe seachtainiúil, agus ansin déanfar 60% den fhuílleach a mheasúnú mar a hacmhainní seachtainiúla
€110 – €60 (don 3 lá a oibríodh) = €25 x 60% = €15
Child Benefit is not taken into account in the assessment of means
Ní chuirtear Sochar Leanaí san áireamh nuair atá acmhainní á ríomh
